text: David John Howard Thompson (25 December 1961 â€“ 23 October 2010) was the sixth Prime Minister of Barbados from 15 January 2008 until his death from pancreatic cancer on 23 October 2010. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Barbados Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer
title: David Thompson (Barbadian politician)
